Job Description: “Unifying Purpose, Shaping Careers” – We believe in a world where organizational strategies are brought to life; when everyone finds value in their work by aligning organizational purpose with people, where we inspire a meaningful and impactful future.Our client has established itself as a global transport and logistics company. They are ranked as one of the largest container shipping lines and have diverted into global logistics network over the last few years operating in more than 30 countries.The ChallengesYou will operate in Cambodia, overseeing the operations for both Cambodia and Vietnam that covers warehousing, transportation and local distributions.As this is a joint venture, your role is to lead and develop an effective Senior Management team You will lead and develop inspection strategies for implementation at the operational level to ensure the service level is at the optimal levelLead and develop an inspection framework to support new and ongoing customer operationsReport to the HQ in Singapore and the joint venture partners, you will review the P&L and provide to date Performance ReviewYou will improve company revenue and profit by developing and implementing growth strategies, managing country P&L and conducting the performance review exercise with the management teamBe responsible for delivering the business result, you will participate in the development of the company’s long-term strategy.Follow-up on AR of relevant customers ensures payment timeliness.Explore and propose all possibilities for reducing the cost of servicing the relevant customersLead and develop the team in securing new businesses
Job Requirement: Degree in business management or a master’s in business administration or another relevant field.At least 5 years of experience as a manager or in another relevant field.Excellent people management skills and dispute management skillsAll information will be kept in the strictest confidentiality.Priority responses will be given to candidates who are shortlisted.Employment Agency No: 11C5794

To rethink talent requires bold moves and breaking away from traditional norms, where we focus on purpose, people, and potential, not just profits.

** Location:
Vattanac Capital Tower, Level 6 Suite 0606, 66 Monivong Boulevard, Sangkat Wat Phnom,Khan Duan Penh, Phnom Penh, Cambodia
Company Profile:
Incorporated in 2020, MR RETAIL was launched with a purpose to bring leading lifestyle brands & products to emerging markets in Asean region. Our brands are aspirational yet affordable and bring sustainable value to its customers. We plan to bring the best in the world targeting 100+ stores in Cambodia, Myanmar & Laos by 2025.

** Our Founder
MR RETAIL is headed by Munish Rishi, A dynamic, proactive, result oriented leader with more than two decades of expertise in all formats of retail across southeast asia and associated markets. He has worked with leading retail groups & brands in Sports, Fashion & Accessories, Health & Beauty, Department stores and Home Stores i.e. Nike, Marks & Spencer, Levi’s Strauss, Central group, Vingroup amongst others.

** Our Vision
To be a leading retailer in our markets, delivering outstanding products and services by investing in our brands, stores and people.

** Address
Vattanac Capital Tower, Level 6 Suite 0606, 66 Monivong Boulevard, Sangkat Wat Phnom, Khan Duan Penh, Phnom Penh, Cambodia

Job Description:
- Manage marketing and networking events for sales personnel
- Manage sales department relationships/interactions with other internal departments
- Responsible for improving sales and operations which requires willingness to change with the evolving nature of the construction business
- Develop and implement short- and long-term sales strategies and plans (e.g., plan sales routes, new customer generation, etc.) to achieve sales targets
- Assign geographical sales territories and establish budgets 
- Monitor the team's key performance indicator achievements 
-Conduct regular reviews to provide feedback on performance gaps and requirements for improvement
- Manage and monitor progress of sales activities, including market demands, client budget, and project call cycles. 
- Implement customized solutions based on changing markets and trends
- Identify product gaps and improvement opportunities based on lost sales data, customer feedback, etc.
- Manage reporting of sales and projected sales forecasts for assigned territories
- Propose areas for customer base expansion based on market knowledge
- Manage continuous improvement on sales processes, sales plans, customer satisfaction, etc. Analyze collection trends and suggest solutions for prompt payments
- Manage customer issue resolutions and recommend preventive actions to minimize future incidents
- Develop and build relationships with customers to achieve business objectives
- Collaborate with internal stakeholders to better understand client requirements and to leverage cross product/ industry business opportunities
- Write the sales reports and present to management
- Coordination all corrective actions of any production problems that may arise and work with management in development and implementation of corrective and preventive actions.
- Assisting the team and management when needed
Job Requirement:
- At least 2-5 years of experience in in a similar role especially in construction channel is required and previous construction knowledge, desired
- Degree or professional qualification in Business Studies/ Marketing/ Economics or a related discipline is required
- Demonstrate sound knowledge and understanding of the industry/ market/ competitors/ customers
- Demonstrate sound knowledge and a proven sales track record in assigned territories/ products/ services and an existing network of contacts
- Strong organizational and managerial skills are required
- Must have demonstrated ability to lead a diverse team of sales and marketing workers
- Good communication skills and ability to work well with people at all levels
- Some training experience such as soft skills and techniques, other skills and regulations related to sales will also be helpful
- Good written and spoken English
- Must be familiar with Microsoft office
- Ability to perform the multi-task and meet deadlines;

** Benefits:
+ Basic salary
+ Allowance
+ Lunch
+ Bonus
+ 18days of annual leave
+ And other benefit

** Working Hour:
- Monday to Friday, 9am to 6pm (1hour lunch break)
- Saturday, 9am to 1pm

- Contact Person: HR Department
- Email: l.vinita@gc-empire.com
- Tel: 061 788 309
- Website: https://gcc-gp.com
- Address: Phnom Penh National Highway 6, Khtor Village, Phum Preaek Lieb, Sangkat Prek Leap, Chroy Changvar, Phnom Penh
Company Profile: GC CITY is subordinate of Golden Cambodian Century Group (GCC). GC City mainly owns land in the city town center of Cambodia and the core area of Sihanoukville, with a total planned development area of more than 2.5 million square meters and an investment of 2 billion US dollars. The current development projects include: Borey NADI by GC City, CEO Wyndham Residence, GC Orussey Market and GC Residence.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department  070 311616 / 011 311616 s.nich@gc-empire.com National Highway 6, Khtor Village, Phum Preaek Lieb, Sangkat Prek Leap, Chroy Changvar, Phnom Penh 12112 070 311616 / 011 311616

Job Description:
•	Prepare, examine, analyses accounting records, financial statement and assess accuracy of financial report, completeness, and conformance to reporting and procedural standards.
•	To perform fund transfer and cash receipt in the system
•	Preparation of monthly accrual for monthly closing 
•	To ensure that accounting record and taxable has been reconcile
•	Preparation of revenue and expense recognition with the construction completed, coordinate with construction team and report to Finance Manager.
•	Handle fixed asset register and calculate depreciation periodically according to the rate decided.
•	Ensure month end closing activities are complete with the agreed timeline with regards to sales revenue and sales & administrative expense.
•	To produce the financial report of companies
•	To follow up outstanding advance 
•	To ensure that all prepaid schedule to comply with accrual concept. 
•	Check and verifies all of account payable and account receivable work to follow with accounting standard and company policies.
Job Requirement:
- Holding Master or Bachelor degree in Accounting or Similar Degree
- Three years or more working experience in accounting field.
- Fluent in writing and speaking English and Must have excellent computer skill ( i.e. MS Office) and  accounting software 
- Strong communication, interpersonal and leadership skill
- Be able to under pressure and good at working as team

Company Profile:
IEL International School was founded in 2003. IEL International School, as one of the leading school in Cambodia with its main focus is on Virtue, Discipline, Quality and Dignity. 

IEL International School has expanded nearly twenty years and continues to provide high-quality educational services and charitable activities.

IEL International School management philosophy is based on responsibility and mutual respect. 
Our Vision
Note that the tours are booked well in advance and only a certain number of parents can be accommodated on each tour on first come first serve basis. Also it should be noted that the tour does not guarantee that the child will be accepted in the school as this depends on the availability and also the eligibility of the child.
Our Mission
Accepts applications from prospective parents throughout the year and those interested are encouraged to contact the school by way of telephone or e-mail by using the contact form to get information. In order to gain more insight into our program, parents should attend.
a school tour before applying.
Core Beliefs
Note that the tours are booked well in advance and only a certain number of parents can be accommodated on each tour on first come first serve basis. Also it should be noted that the tour does not guarantee that the child will be accepted in the school as this depends on the availability and also the eligibility of the child.
To help achieve the company’s vision, we are seeking employees who are responsible, committed, highly motivated, willing to work as a team and accept challenges.

The school provides many benefits to the employees such as:

• Competitive salary
• NSSF 
• Maternity, paternity, and marriage leave
• Annual leave and sick leave
• Public Holidays based on Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training
• Career advancement opportunities
• Excellent training for professional development
• Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review
• Seniority payment

Job Description:
Planning concepts by studying relevant information and materials.

• Coordinating with outside agencies, art services, web designer, marketing, printers, and colleagues as necessary.

Job Requirement: - Bachelor’s degree Business Administration, Management, Operations, related fields.- Minimum 1-year experience school operation, maintenance facility preferred.- Experience international school a plus;- Ability work well under tight deadlines deliver effective result;- Desire learn overcome challenges;- Hard working and self-motivated person, honest, reliable, loyal, very good team work;- Professional appearance excellent interpersonal skills;- High sense responsibility, result oriented, dynamic- Good analytical creative problem solving skills;- Good organizational time management skills;- Fast learner desire achieve set goals.- Proficiency in Word, Excel and PowerPoint.- Location : St. H.E Chea Sophara, Russey Koe, Phnom Penh - Salary Rank : $1K-$1.5K- Industry : International School- Working Days : Mon-Fri- Working Hour : 8am-5pm
